sentences.sContent: Blood vessels in the lungs are filled and distend. Capillary changes have been observed in the animal model of simulated microgravity.
sentences.sContent_eng: Blood vessels in the lungs are filled and distend. Capillary changes have been observed in the animal model of simulated microgravity.
sentences.sCn: 肺血管充盈、扩张，并在模拟微重力动物模型中观察到肺微血管损伤。

sentences.sContent: The primary role of AM is to distend blood vessel and decrease blood pressure, and it can also restrain the migration of vessel smooth muscle cells.
sentences.sContent_eng: The primary role of AM is to distend blood vessel and decrease blood pressure, and it can also restrain the migration of vessel smooth muscle cells.
sentences.sCn: AM在休克发生发展过程的作用主要是扩张血管，降低血压，还具有抑制血管平滑肌细胞迁移等作用。

sentences.sContent: Conclusion:Nifedipine could distend ophthalmic artery and has similar function on other micro-cerebral vessels.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conclusion:Nifedipine could distend ophthalmic artery and has similar function on other micro-cerebral vessels.
sentences.sCn: 结论：硝苯地平可扩张眼动脉，对脑部其它小动脉可能有相似作用。
